definition: to think back over sth/to review/to revisit/to rethink/reflection/reassessment
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: The image of youth comes from the artist's self-reflection and expression of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 少年的形象是出於作者對自我情緒的反思和表達。

sentences.english: It is worth rethinking to provide member investment choice.
sentences.chinese: 而提供成員投資選擇更值得反思。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter focuses on the apocalypse and a second think of patent pools.
sentences.chinese: 第四章闡述了專利池所帶來的啓示的反思。

sentences.english: There- fore, there is much room for further rethinking of the common behavior theory in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 因此，日本行爲共同說是值得反思的。

sentences.english: Then evaluates and considers the actualities of the prerogative of mercy that in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上對我國赦免權的現狀進行評價和反思。

sentences.english: We can reflect on our first order or base level experiences.
sentences.chinese: 我們能反思基層的體驗。

sentences.english: Philosophy got rise to the mediation of human being and its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 哲學產生於對人的存在及其意義的反思。

sentences.english: Cultural Studies provides an indispensable background for the reflection on literary theory as a discipline.
sentences.chinese: 文化研究是文藝學學科反思的重要學術背景。

sentences.english: High school Chinese classroom to raise teaching of reviewing etc. teaching quality of Chinese there is a great meaning.
sentences.chinese: 高中語文課堂反思性教學對提高教學質量有重大意義。

sentences.english: The lessons of these losers deserve our reflection.
sentences.chinese: 這些失敗者的教訓值得所有媒體反思。

sentences.english: Reflective warriors have a tragic sensibility.
sentences.chinese: 會反思的戰士有一種悲劇敏感性。

sentences.english: On this basis, the author rethinks it dispassionately and draws a conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，冷靜地對其反思，並得出自己的結論。

sentences.english: This film will make every Chinese rethink profoundly.
sentences.chinese: 該片使每個中國人作深刻的反思。

sentences.english: Socialist realism is undoubtedly the result of imagining collectively, worth reviewing.
sentences.chinese: 社會主義現實主義無疑是集體想像的結果，值得反思。

sentences.english: All of these challenges required afundamental rethinking of the U.S.and global economy.
sentences.chinese: 上述挑戰需要從根本上對美國和全球經濟的反思。

sentences.english: Japan should remember and reflect upon history.
sentences.chinese: 日本應銘記歷史，深刻反思。

definition: to reflect upon oneself/to examine one's conscience/to question oneself/to search one's soul
to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
a re-examination/to have another look at sth
to seek the cause in oneself rather than sb else
to think of the pain when the pain is gone (idiom)/to ponder about a painful experience
to draw a lesson (from a setback)
